mapper.insert: insert into ec_audio_video (audio_video_cd, gen_date, cust_no, file_nam, content_typ, principal, file_typ, file_url, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat, file_blob) values (#{audioVideoCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{genDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contentTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{principal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileBlob,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY})
mapper.update: update ec_audio_video set gen_date = #{genDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cust_no = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_nam = #{fileNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content_typ = #{contentTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, principal = #{principal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_typ = #{fileTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_url = #{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_stat = #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_blob = #{fileBlob,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY} where audio_video_cd = #{audioVideoCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select audio_video_cd, gen_date, cust_no, file_nam, content_typ, principal, file_typ, file_url, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat, file_blob from ec_audio_video where audio_video_cd = #{audioVideoCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select audio_video_cd, gen_date, cust_no, file_nam, content_typ, principal, file_typ, file_url, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat, file_blob from ec_audio_video

select audio_video_cd, gen_date, cust_no, file_nam, content_typ, principal, file_typ, file_url, file_blob, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from ec_audio_video where cust_no = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and rec_stat = '0'
and file_nam like concat('%', #{fileNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and principal like concat('%', #{principal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
